@megatomche @GoHugoIO @Netlify Nice! https://t.co/s3GwiUrh4o Good tip about putting the @GoHugoIO version in your netlfiy.toml. And noting that you could even run different versions for different build contexts if you were developing against a snazzy new version that you're not yet ready to use in production
